channel.title: Snow biomes
channel.description:
These snow biomes are starting to become really annoying, they're everywhere, so I propose we start actually changing some of the biomes secretly. We could use plugins such as :
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-biome-v0-3-1-change-biomes-permissions-953.24634/
Bare in mind I have no idea what version that is for, but I'm sure if somebody could tell me what Bukkit # we're on I could find a plugin to change the biomes.
Thoughts?

item.title: Snow biomes
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I think I saw an option someplace to turn off snow all together, but we don’t want that, right?

Not really, some members such as mironic live far out just for a pure untouched snow biome.

Read full topic

item.title: Snow biomes
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Please do tell. I HATE SNOW!

Read full topic

item.title: Snow biomes
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Actually to add onto this I think its possible to change biomes now could be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Snow biomes
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I agree, its even worse because the area we built the castle in was a nice open prairie free from snow, but when the chunks changed around with the new generation it changed the area into a snow biome

and i hate having half of the lake frozen over

Read full topic

item.title: Snow biomes
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

That’s actually a good idea. There’s nothing worse than relocating to a better looking area then you find out that it’s a not-yet-generated snow biome. It’s happened to me before, and it was very annoying.

I didn’t think you could change the biome’s, but if it’s possible, then we should do this without doubt.

Read full topic
